title: Kassadin glitch
body: When Blitzcrank pulled me I was ulting as Kass and Kass's ult has a cast time so when Blitzcrank pulled me it didn't get interrupted. btw I was ulting to a place to dodge the pull.

replies.body: Abilities that have a delay but don't have a channel time for it won't be interrupted by CC. This is most evident in Ezreal's Arcane Shift when he is grabbed by Blitz; it does the same thing as you describe here, and it's intended.
